To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private AccumulationDistribution _ad;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_ad = AD(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_ad.IsReady)
{
    var current = _ad.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.ad = self.AD(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.ad.IsReady:
    current = self.ad.Current.Value
